name: jsCookies
body:
Usage ========= Simply put this in the <head> of your code: <script type="text/javascript" src="../jscookies.js"></script> Get Cookie Value ========= getCookie("name"); Create Cookie & Set Value ========= setCookie("name","value",365); name - Name of the cookie
value - Value of the cookie
365 - Number of days till cookie expires Delete Cookie ========= eraseCookie("name");
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
